name: RadonEyeplus
0:
”Alexa, ask radon eye for all rooms”
”Alexa, ask radon eye for living room one”
”Alexa, ask radon eye for all radon value”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radon eye
des:
This skill is for user who has RD200P to receive radon value checking service through Amazon Alexa. 

It needs to register RD200P serial and Amazon ID to RD200P App.
And user link Amazon account to one or multi RD200P device. 

Also radon value unit is Baqueals and you can change picocuire by voice.
